about_the_game:
Want more challenge? Timelie: Hell Loop, the game’s first official DLC is now available for the hardcore puzzle lover craving more!

Prepare to dive into madness with additional puzzles designed to kill both your time and your patience, complete with all-new gimmicks and strategies!

KEY FEATURES

  • MORE THAN 30 LEVELS OF NEW PUZZLES
    Hell Loop is a 10+ hour adventure filled with unexpected puzzles and mind-blowing tricks unlike anything you’ve seen in the original game.
  • DESIGNED FOR HARDCORE
    No compromise and no mercy. Beat the original chapters to access Hell Loop and prepare to torment your sanity with new puzzles that use Timelie’s unique mechanics to their full potential.
  • NO STORY ADDITION
    Please don’t expect any new story-related content. Like, seriously…
  • AND FOR FREE!
    Download now for free and experience the madness that is Hell Loop. Can you make it to the end? 😛

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.12 (Sierra)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Timelie : Hell Loop - DLC Puzzle Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 / AMD Phenom II X4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / AMD Radeon R9 350
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Expand your experience of Timelie with Hell Loop, the DLC Puzzle Pack which designed for the hardcore gamers with brand new and exciting puzzle levels.
supported_languages: English, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
